name: Sakshi
greetingText: I really love your name btw!
wishText:
Hey you, my sunshine! ☀️💛 You make my world brighter every day. Happiest Birthday, my love! May all your dreams come true so that I can see you fly. 
I Love you the most!💙
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText:
Hey Sakhi 💙 
 I’m the happiest person on earth—all because of you! I’m sorry we can’t celebrate together this year, but from next year onward, I promise to be there for your every birthday!🎉
You’re my best friend, my guide, my missing piece, and my greatest pride. Whatever I am today is because of you. One day, I’ll marry you, and we’ll say, Yes, we did it!💍
Happiest Birthday, my cutu! 💙
A little Gift from my side 💙 Do let me know if you liked it or not :)
replayText: N Click on Me, if you wanna watch it again.
